price: (Isaanis) "Nuti ishee irraa nyaachuu feena jedhan. onneewwan teenya tasgabbaa’uus,ati dhugaa nutti dubbattee mirkaneeffachus (feena) nuti san irratti warra ragaa ba’an irraa ta’uu (feena)" (jedhan).
arabic: قَالُواْ نُرِيدُ أَن نَّأۡكُلَ مِنۡهَا وَتَطۡمَئِنَّ قُلُوبُنَا وَنَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ صَدَقۡتَنَا وَنَكُونَ عَلَيۡهَا مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū nurīdu an nakula min'hā wataṭma-inna qulūbunā wanaʿlama an qad ṣadaqtanā wanakūna ʿalayhā mina al-shāhidīna
translations: you have spoken the truth to us
